depth.description: Measured in m. NOTE: hole depth is implicitly described by the depthSamples array if present.

drillingBearing.description: Applicable to angled holes only. Measured in degrees. North is 0°, East is 90°, South is 180°, West is 270°.

depthSamples.description: This optional property will contain an array of offset sample data to describe the borehole deviation if available.

eastingOffset.description: The offset in the easting direction as measured from the collar. Measured in m.

northingOffset.description: The offset in the northing direction as measured from the collar. Measured in m.

depth.description: The depth of the above northing/easting offset values.

centerLeftOffset.description: Left offset of the center of the hole relative to the canvas. Measured in m.

centerTopOffset.description: Top offset of the center of the hole relative to the canvas. Measured in m.
